item.title: Use powershell profiles like a pro
item.description: If you do any software development in a Windows environment, you'll be spending enough time inside the Powershell (PS) console that it will be worth customizing the PS Profile to speed up your workflow. The PS Profile is essentially a .ps1 script that is run whenever a new PS console is opened.
